record.name: learn.bu.edu
record.explanation: Blackboard Learn is the newest learning management system at Boston University; it is used in on- and off-campus courses, certificate programs, and clerkships.In this class, I quoted the textbook and materials on learn.bu.edu

record.name: W3Schools
record.explanation: W3Schools is optimized for learning, testing, and training. Examples might be simplified to improve reading and basic understanding. I test most code in the "Try it yourself section"

record.name: JQuery.com
record.explanation: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers. I followed the definition of JQuery APIs here

record.name: Stackoverflow
record.explanation: Stack Overflow is a question and answer site for professional and enthusiast programmers. I searched this website for troubleshooting.
